name: wishmaker
description: This is a wish making application allowing the user to create, make, save, and delete wishes. ![Game Image](https://github.com/MDTrue/WishMaker/blob/master/public/assets/images/WishMaker.JPG) a demo of the Wish Maker app can be found here https://serene-depths-48701.herokuapp.com/ Made with:  * css  * bootstrap  * javascript  * jquery  * node.js  * express  * mysql  * handlebars  * body-parser
